mapper.insert:
select homsitterlist_seq.nextval from dual
insert into homesitterlist(hsl_num,hsl_service_type,hsl_chkin,hsl_chkout,hsl_pet_age,hsl_size) values(#{hsl_num},#{hsl_service_type},#{hsl_chkin},#{hsl_chkout},#{hsl_pet_age},#{hsl_size})

select homsitterlist_seq.nextval from dual
insert into homesitterlist(hsl_address,hsl_d_address) values(#{hsl_address},#{hsl_d_address})
